title: Create Encapsulated BankAccount
description:
Create a BankAccount class with:
- private field: balance (double)
- constructor that sets initial balance
- getBalance() method
- deposit(double amount) method (only if amount > 0)
- withdraw(double amount) method (only if amount > 0 and balance sufficient)

testCases.description:

return acc.getBalance();

hints.text: Define a function using the java syntax. Don't forget the return statement if needed.
Use an if statement to check the condition.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to java code.
